data.message: THE GEEKS at FB have made this site as complicated as possible making it difficult at best to stop notifications from certain FB pages....Congradulations.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Phil. To turn off notifications from Pages, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2dEYaAB -Joe

Facebook Unfortunately this often doesn't work with regard to posts. Even though you click on not wanting to receive updates you still do, even days after sometimes. Is there a way to best prevent this?
if on a cell phone you can also go to the app settings and block all notifications Marian Eeltink
